channel.title: Performance on Greeting.
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Greeting.

item.title: How to fix Unity 2019.3 Editor Performance Problem
item.description: These two months I had a lagging experience with untiy editor. I thought it was the problem of Odin or my old computer . But today I found it’s not at all. If you have this problem, maybe following steps would help you fix it. How to profile Editor Open Window - > Analysis - > Profiler Click “PlayMode” button, and switch to Editor. Click the red round button, which is “Recording”, to stop at this frame.
